item.title: Squid Game Star Lee Jung Jae's Unedited Appearance Shocks Fans: 'He Aged Like That?' - News18
item.description:
Lee Jung Jae Shocks Fans with Unfiltered Appearance at Netflix Event

Date: January 15, 2025

Source: News18

South Korean actor Lee Jung Jae garnered attention for his return to Netflix's Squid Game Season 2, but his recent unfiltered appearance has sparked mixed reactions from fans.

  • Lee appeared at a Netflix event showcasing signs of aging, including visible wrinkles and fine lines.
  • His natural look contrasts sharply with the polished images typically seen in Squid Game.
  • Fans expressed shock on social media, with comments ranging from criticism to support for Lee's authentic appearance.
  • Despite mixed reactions, many defended the actor, emphasizing the reality of aging.
  • During the event, Lee spoke about new characters in the upcoming season and expressed his hopes for viewer engagement.
“Time is really scary,” remarked one fan, while another added, “He is 52. Of course he’s going to have some wrinkles; what’s the issue?”

Lee's unedited look has sparked important conversations about aging in the entertainment industry and the pressure of maintaining appearance.

item.title: Watch: Inside Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma's Rs 32 Crore Plush Alibaug Bungalow With Temperature-Cont.. - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Watch: Inside Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma's Rs 32 Crore Plush Alibaug Bungalow With Temperature-Controlled Pool

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Star cricketer Virat Kohli recently returned to Mumbai from his holiday home in Alibaug, showcasing a lavish property complete with luxury amenities.

  • The bungalow was built on an 8-acre plot acquired for approximately Rs 19 crore in 2022.
  • Spanning 10,000 square feet, it features a temperature-controlled pool, bespoke kitchen, four bathrooms, a jacuzzi, and a sprawling garden.
  • Kohli invested an estimated Rs 10.5 crore to Rs 13 crore in the construction of the villa, which showcases high-end materials including Italian marble.
  • Amidst his recent poor performance in cricket, there is speculation about Kohli and Anushka relocating to London in the future.
  • Kohli is included in the probables list for the last two fixtures of the Ranji Trophy, although his participation is doubtful.
“It is unlikely that he would participate in any of the two games.”

This luxurious home represents a significant investment for the couple and reflects their status in the celebrity sphere.

item.title: Sobhita Dhulipala, Naga Chaitanya, Shilpa Shetty Kundra, and others celebrate Pongal, Sankranti with heartfelt wishes - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Celebrities Celebrate Pongal and Makar Sankranti with Heartfelt Wishes

Published on: Jan 15, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

The festive spirit was alive among celebrities as they celebrated Pongal and Makar Sankranti with their loved ones. From newlywed couples to doting parents, many took to social media to share glimpses of their celebrations, expressing gratitude, love, and well-wishes for the year ahead.

Take a look:

  • Actors Sobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya celebrated their first Pongal, Sankranti after wedding.
  • Actor Nayanthara shared a glimpse of her celebrations and captioned, "Let us express our heartfelt thanks to the Tamil farmers who make us live. Happy Pongal wishes.."
  • Actor Rashmika Mandanna wished her followers saying, “Happiest Sankranthi/Pongal my loves. I hope this year brings you all the love, happiness and good health.”
  • Actor Keerthy Suresh introduced her grandson during Pongal celebrations, wishing everyone a beautiful festival.
  • Actor Shilpa Shetty Kundra celebrated with her mother and visited the temple, sharing festive greetings.
“Happy Makar Sankranti. Til gud ghya god god bola.” - Shilpa Shetty Kundra

This festive season has been marked by love and gratitude among friends and family, capturing the essence of Pongal and Makar Sankranti.

item.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Abhira arrives at Poddar House for Makar Sankranti but leaves after being insulted - India Forums
item.description:
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Abhira leaves Poddar House after being insulted during Makar Sankranti

Published: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 8:04 AM Source: Star Plus

'Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai' continues its captivating storyline as Abhira prepares for Makar Sankranti, only to encounter insults at the Poddar House.

Key Points

  • Abhira is excited to celebrate Makar Sankranti at the Poddar House.
  • She faces insults, particularly from Vidya, leading to her exit from the Poddar House.
  • The tension between Abhira and Armaan is exacerbated by family dynamics.
  • The episode sets up a cliffhanger regarding Abhira's relationship with Armaan.
“It will be interesting to see whether Armaan-Abhira will reunite or fall apart.”

The upcoming episodes promise more drama as the complicated relationships unfold.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat shouts at Savi over missing Kiaan, who is actually enjoying video games - India Forums
item.description:
Tensions Rise in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin as Rajat Confronts Savi Over Missing Kiaan

Published: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 7:25 AM | Source: Star Plus

The latest episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin features a dramatic turn of events as Ashika takes charge after Kiaan goes missing, while Kiaan is actually found enjoying his video games.

  • Ashika, who has re-entered the lives of Savi and Rajat, attempts to create conflict by falsely accusing Savi of negligence regarding Kiaan.
  • Kiaan's disappearance leads to heightened tensions and confrontations, especially when Rajat confronts Savi about Kiaan's whereabouts.
  • Ashika's manipulative tactics are aimed at driving a wedge between Rajat and Savi, leveraging Kiaan as a pawn in her scheme.
  • The episode poses a cliffhanger questioning Kiaan's safety and the real motives behind his disappearance.
Rajat shouts at Savi, demanding to know where Kiaan is, showcasing increasing frustration and concern over his son's safety.

The unfolding drama emphasizes themes of trust and manipulation, leaving viewers eager to see how Rajat and Savi will navigate this twist in their relationship.

item.title: Navya Nanda shares, then deletes pics from Rann of Kutch trip with grandma Jaya Bachchan, Shweta; gets schooled by mom - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Navya Nanda Shares, Then Deletes Pictures from Rann of Kutch Trip

Date: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Navya Nanda enjoyed a trip to the Rann of Kutch with her grandmother Jaya Bachchan and mother Shweta Bachchan. She shared and later deleted pictures from their time together, sparking a playful interaction with her mother on social media.

  • Navya posted photos showcasing the beautiful white desert and moments with family.
  • Shweta jokingly questioned Navya about her trip, leading to a light-hearted exchange online.
  • Navya has been recognized for her efforts in entrepreneurship and addressing gender inequality through Project Naveli.
“Did you go alone??” - Shweta Bachchan

The playful exchange highlights the close bond in the Bachchan family while Navya continues to pursue her own path beyond acting.

item.title: Sobhita Dhulipala Is All Smiles As She Poses With Naga Chaitanya On Makar Sankranti | Photo - News18
item.description:
Sobhita Dhulipala Is All Smiles As She Poses With Naga Chaitanya On Makar Sankranti | Photo

Date: January 15, 2025
Source: News18

Sobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya celebrated their first Makar Sankranti as a married couple on January 14, 2025, sharing joyful moments on social media.

  • The couple married on December 4, 2024, at Annapurna Studios, Hyderabad.
  • Sobhita wore a beautiful red saree, and Naga Chaitanya complemented her with a beige kurta.
  • Naga shared a joyful Instagram post, captioned “Panduga vibes with my Visakha queen”.
  • Previously, Sobhita shared festive images including a traditional bonfire and a decorated rangoli.
  • Naga's father, Nagarjuna, shared their wedding pictures and expressed happiness about Sobhita joining their family.
“Watching Sobhita and Chay begin this beautiful chapter together has been a special and emotional moment for me.”

This celebration marked their first festival together as husband and wife, symbolizing new beginnings.

item.title: Sankranthiki Vasthunnam posts massive day 1 collections in AP and TS - 123telugu
item.description:
Sankranthiki Vasthunnam Posts Massive Day 1 Collections in AP and TS

Published on: Jan 15, 2025 12:05 pm IST

Sankranthiki Vasthunnam was released to rave reviews and has become the most sought-after movie this festive season, directed by Anil Ravipudi and starring Venkatesh, Meenakshi Chaudhary, and Aishwarya Rajesh.

  • The film collected Rs. 4.24 crore share in the Nizam region on its opening day.
  • Additional collections include: East: Rs. 1.61 crore, West: Rs. 1.40 crore, Krishna: Rs. 1.70 crore, Guntur: Rs. 1.65 crore, Nellore: Rs. 0.60 crore, Vizag: Rs. 1.50 crore, Ceded: Rs. 3.02 crore.
  • In total, the film garnered nearly Rs. 5 crore in Karnataka and additional Rs. 5 crore overseas.
  • Total day 1 shares in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana amount to over Rs. 15.72 crore, with worldwide total reaching Rs. 25.72 crore.

With its festive appeal, the film's collections are expected to rise further over the weekend.

item.title: Anand Deverakonda and Vaishnavi Chaitanya team up for the third time - 123telugu
item.description:
Anand Deverakonda and Vaishnavi Chaitanya Team Up for Their Third Film Together

Published on Jan 15, 2025 11:48 am IST

Sithara Entertainments has announced an exciting new project featuring the beloved duo Anand Deverakonda and Vaishnavi Chaitanya, set to be directed by Aditya Hasan.

  • The project is a sequel to the acclaimed series #90’s – A Middle Class Biopic.
  • Naga Vamsi aims to blend relatable middle-class themes with youthful elements.
  • Music will be composed by Hesham Abdul Wahab, promising a memorable experience.
  • The film is anticipated to start production soon, with further details to follow.
"This project promises to capture hearts once again and delivers a relatable narrative set for the big screen." - Naga Vamsi

The anticipation around this collaboration highlights the popularity of both Deverakonda and Chaitanya, ensuring excitement for their third on-screen venture.

item.title: After Ekta Kapoor, Amar Upadhyay claps back at Ram Kapoor’s comments on his career slump after shift to films: ‘I am not sitting at home’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
After Ekta Kapoor, Amar Upadhyay claps back at Ram Kapoor’s comments on his career slump after shift to films: ‘I am not sitting at home’

Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Amar Upadhyay has responded to Ram Kapoor's critical comments regarding his transition from television to films, defending his career choices and asserting his ongoing work in the industry.

  • Ram Kapoor claimed he advised Amar against leaving television, suggesting it was a poor career move.
  • Amar disputed Ram's account, asserting he stays busy and does not sit idle for long.
  • He mentioned his consistent work in various projects since 2003, including successful web series and films.
  • Amar has more projects in the pipeline, including a potential new TV show.
“I don’t sit at home for more than two to four days; I go mad if I don’t work.” - Amar Upadhyay

Amar emphasized his positive mindset and determination to dismiss negative comments about his career, while the controversy highlights ongoing tensions within the industry.

item.title: When Sharmila Tagore spoke about converting to Islam when she married Tiger Pataudi: 'You couldn't be fli - TOI Etimes
item.description:
When Sharmila Tagore spoke about converting to Islam when she married Tiger Pataudi: 'You couldn't be flippant...'

Published on: N/A Source: Times of India

Sharmila Tagore shares her personal journey of converting to Islam upon marrying Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi, emphasizing the challenges faced in their interfaith union.

  • Sharmila converted to Islam to marry Tiger Pataudi, revealing the complexities involved.
  • She expressed that the conversion was neither easy nor hard, and one had to face it sincerely.
  • Sharmila learned more about both Hinduism and Islam after her conversion.
  • She shared her first meeting with her mother-in-law and the respectful bond they formed.
  • Despite receiving death threats during their wedding preparations, the ceremony went smoothly.
“In Kolkata, when I was getting married, my parents were getting telegrams saying that bullets shall speak... despite the tension, the wedding and reception went smoothly.” - Sharmila Tagore

This personal account highlights the societal pressures and deep commitment within their interfaith marriage.

item.title: Shweta Bachchan fires back as daughter Navya Naveli omits her, Jaya Bachchan from Rann of Kutch holiday pics - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shweta Bachchan fires back as daughter Navya Naveli omits her, Jaya Bachchan from Rann of Kutch holiday pics

Updated: January 15, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Navya Naveli Nanda shared photos from her trip to the Rann of Kutch, which sparked a social media exchange with her mother, Shweta Bachchan.

  • Navya's original post did not include her mother or grandmother, Jaya Bachchan.
  • Shweta commented, "Did you go alone??" responding to the omission.
  • Navya reacted with laughter emojis and fired back with a humorous remark.
  • Navya later deleted the initial post and shared new pictures.
Shweta Bachchan: "Did you go alone??"
Navya Naveli: "Did you? Because wth!"

This conversation highlights the playful yet candid dynamic between the family members on social media.

item.title: Rakesh Roshan's ‘South cinema is successful because they’re not breaking any path’ comment irks Reddit: ‘What nonsense’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rakesh Roshan's comments on South cinema's storytelling spark backlash on Reddit

Publication Date: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Rakesh Roshan commented on the success of South cinema, stating that while it has made technological advancements, its storytelling remains stuck in traditional formats. This has led to criticism on social media.

  • Last year, South cinema nearly outperformed Bollywood at the box office, reigniting debates about their respective successes.
  • Roshan believes South cinema is successful because it avoids risking new storytelling paths.
  • Many Reddit users backlash against Roshan's views, calling out perceived arrogance in Bollywood.
“What about Eega? Can a Bollywood movie with a fly as the hero break any records?” - Reddit User

The backlash has highlighted a divide in opinions about the evolution of Indian cinema, with many arguing that regional films are more innovative. Roshan's film 'Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai' was also re-released to mark its 25th anniversary.

item.title: Fateh Box Office Collection Day 5: Sonu Sood starrer sees good growth on Tuesday; actor declares film as - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 5: Sonu Sood Starrer Sees Growth; Actor Declares Film a HIT

Date: Recent Date | Source: Times of India

The film 'Fateh' featuring Sonu Sood has shown significant growth at the box office, earning Rs 12 crore on its fifth day of release, leading the actor to declare it a HIT.

  • Film collected Rs 12 crore on Day 5.
  • Sonu Sood highlights the positive audience reception.
  • Growth indicates strong word-of-mouth promotion.
“The audience has truly embraced Fateh, and it reflects in the box office numbers” - Sonu Sood.

The success of 'Fateh' shows the potential for Indian cinema to resonate well with the audience, especially when backed by strong performances and engaging storytelling.

item.title: Oscars 2025 may get cancelled for the first time in 96 years due to LA wildfires: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Oscars 2025 May Be Canceled Due to LA Wildfires

Date: January 15, 2025, Source: Hindustan Times

The devastating wildfires in Los Angeles pose a significant threat to the Oscars ceremony, potentially marking the first cancellation in 96 years due to extensive destruction and loss of life.

  • LA wildfires have caused evacuations and significant loss of life.
  • The Oscars may be canceled for the first time in its history.
  • There is a shift in focus towards support and fundraising as the ceremony is under review.
  • A secret contingency plan is considered due to the severity of the wildfires.
  • The nomination voting period has been extended to January 17.
  • 25 lives have been lost so far, with numbers expected to rise.
“The board’s main concern at this time is to not appear as if they are celebrating while many Angelenos are dealing with heartbreak and unimaginable loss.”

The ongoing situation of the LA wildfires will heavily influence the decisions regarding the Oscars 2025, considering both immediate responses and long-term implications for the ceremony.

item.title: Anushka’s Ghaati: Noted Tamil actor’s look revealed - 123telugu
item.description:
Anushka’s Ghaati: Noted Tamil actor’s look revealed

Published on: Jan 15, 2025 10:01 am IST

Ghaati is one of the most awaited films in Telugu, with Anushka Shetty as the female lead, directed by the renowned Krish.

  • Popular Tamil actor Vikram Prabhu to play a key role as Desi Raju, with his look unveiled on his birthday.
  • Vikram’s unexpected casting has raised fan anticipation for his character.
  • Ghaati is set to release on April 18, 2025, with a teaser that has captured considerable attention.
“Fans are eager to see what kind of character he will portray in the movie.”

Stay tuned for more updates as the release date approaches.

item.title: Author Neil Gaiman denies sexual assault allegations made by 8 women; says 'I’ve now reached the point wh - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Neil Gaiman Responds to Sexual Assault Allegations from Eight Women

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Unknown

In a recent statement, renowned author Neil Gaiman has publicly denied allegations of sexual assault made by eight women. He expressed that after reflecting on the situation, he has reached a point of resolving to uphold his integrity.

  1. Eight women have accused Gaiman of sexual misconduct.
  2. Gaiman asserts that he is innocent of the allegations.
  3. The allegations have sparked discussions within the literary community.
  4. Gaiman encourages dialogue about accountability and personal safety.
“I’ve now reached the point where...”

This situation has highlighted the ongoing challenges in addressing claims of sexual misconduct in literary and artistic fields.

item.title: Shakti Kapoor reveals he begged wife Shivangi Kolhapure to give up promising film career, marry him: ‘Be a housewife’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shakti Kapoor ‘begged’ wife Shivangi Kolhapure to give up a promising film career to marry him: ‘I apologised and said…’

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: The Indian Express

Bollywood actor Shakti Kapoor opens up about his relationship with wife Shivangi Kolhapure, detailing how their love story began and the sacrifices she made for him.

  • Shakti Kapoor and Shivangi Kolhapure have been married for 43 years.
  • Shivangi left a promising career in acting and singing to marry Shakti, despite family opposition.
  • The couple eloped in 1982 and later reconciled with their families.
  • They have two children, including actress Shraddha Kapoor.
“I went to her and begged her. I apologized and told her I wanted to marry her... She gave up her singing career and everything else for me.” - Shakti Kapoor

This heartfelt revelation highlights the deep bond and sacrifices made in their relationship, showcasing a love that has stood the test of time.

item.title: Vidaamuyarchi Trailer Arriving - TrackTollywood
item.description:
Vidaamuyarchi Trailer Arriving Soon

Publication Date: January 2023 Source: Track Tollywood

The latest action thriller from Ajith Kumar, Vidaamuyarchi, is set for release with its trailer arriving soon after a brief postponement.

  • The film was originally scheduled for a Pongal/Sankranthi release but faced delay due to clearance issues.
  • The new release date for the film is set for January 23rd.
  • Clearance issues were linked to rights for the original Hollywood film Breakdown, which had not been obtained.
  • The team anticipates the official NOC letter shortly, after which the trailer will be released.
  • The trailer is expected to drop before the weekend, leading up to the film's release at the end of the month.
